full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: MSVS Transmission Filters

#### Contract Information

* **Procurement Title (English)**: MSVS Transmission Filters
* **Procurement Title (French)**: MSVS Rechanges, Filtre, Fluide sous Pression
* **Procurement Reference Number (English)**: PW-22-01006283
* **Procurement Amendment Number (English)**: 2
* **Procurement Solicitation Number (English)**: W8486-238796/A
* **Publication Date (English)**: September 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time (English)**: September 22, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Procurement Region (English)**: Worldwide

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity (English)**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address (English)**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada
* **Delivered Goods**: AIT13(Single- or multi-sets of (turn) key spares package consisting of one (1- Kit, Fluid Pressure Filter parts).
* **Estimated Value**: Not specified

#### Requirements

* This tender requires the delivery of two types of filtes (CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton) between January 2023 and 31, consisting of excessive items.
* Bidders are required to submit their bids electronically via email, to the address [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca).

#### Documents

The tender documentation is available on the Canada Buy Service platform.

#### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  

#### Regions of Opportunity/Ritique

* Worldwide.

#### Contact

* Tanya Mckenzie, Contracting Officer (English)
  * Email: [tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca)
  * Tel: Not specified
  * Fax: Not specified
